results.idea: Short-term sentiment surprise: business impact projection vs composite business sentiment
results.description: Used multiple datafields (SUGGESTION1) rp_nip_business and rp_css_business to capture surprise between projected impact and aggregate sentiment. Both fields have coverage 0.5 so I applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Fields are scalar (no vec_avg applied per SUGGESTION2). I prioritized high userCount/alphaCount per SUGGESTION4 (rp_css_business userCount=777). Kept operators <=7 and datafields=2 per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.75.

results.idea: Analyst-change amplified sentiment: change in analyst recommendation vs event sentiment
results.description: Combined nws18_ghc_lna (analyst recommendation change) with rp_ess_ratings (event sentiment of ratings). Applied ts_backfill due to coverage 0.5 (SUGGESTION3). No vector ops (SUGGESTION2). Chose high userCount fields per SUGGESTION4. Kept simple operators. Confidence: 0.70.

results.idea: Earnings sentiment momentum: composite earnings sentiment trend
results.description: Single-field momentum using rp_css_earnings (high userCount). Applied ts_backfill (coverage 0.5) and ts_delta to capture momentum. No vec ops. Followed SUGGESTION1 by focusing on meaningful field and SUGGESTION4 for stability. Confidence: 0.72.

results.idea: Event vs composite divergence: partner event sentiment minus composite partner sentiment
results.description: Used rp_ess_partner and rp_css_partner. ts_backfill applied for both (coverage 0.5). No vector usage. Preference for rp_ess_partner due to large userCount. Operators kept minimal. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Price-news lead: price-related event sentiment predicting short-run moves
results.description: Used rp_ess_price and rp_css_price to capture event and composite price sentiment. Both backfilled. Cross-field difference per SUGGESTION1. No vec. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Investor-relations impact: projected impact vs composite investor relations sentiment
results.description: Pair rp_nip_inverstor and rp_css_inverstor. Applied ts_backfill for both. Chosen for high userCount (rp_css_inverstor userCount=420, rp_nip_inverstor=542). No vector ops. Confidence: 0.73.

results.idea: M&A signal: event MNA sentiment momentum
results.description: Single-field rp_ess_mna to capture momentum of M&A-related sentiment. ts_backfill used. Used ts_zscore for normalization. Vector not applicable. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Earnings surprise proxy: event earnings sentiment - composite earnings sentiment
results.description: Subtract rp_ess_earnings and rp_css_earnings after backfill to get surprise. Applied ts_zscore to each. SUGGESTION1 used to combine fields; SUGGESTION4 used high-count earnings fields. Confidence: 0.74.

results.idea: Sentiment correlation breakout: correlation of ratings impact and investor impact
results.description: Used ts_corr between rp_nip_ratings and rp_nip_inverstor to find changing relationships. Backfilled both (coverage 0.5). No vector ops. SUGGESTION4: chose high userCount rating/investor fields. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Composite negative tail mean-reversion: extreme negative composite business sentiment reversion
results.description: Single-field rp_css_business. Applied ts_backfill and ts_zscore then reversed sign to go long on extreme negative sentiment expecting mean reversion. SUGGESTION2 not used (scalar). High userCount used. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Price-target sentiment momentum: ptg impact projection acceleration
results.description: Used rp_nip_ptg (price target impact) with ts_backfill and ts_delta to detect acceleration. Field coverage 0.5 -> backfill. SUGGESTION4 limited since userCount moderate. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Revenue news divergence: revenue event sentiment vs composite revenue sentiment
results.description: Pair rp_ess_revenue and rp_css_revenue, both backfilled. Construct cross-sectional zscore difference to capture surprises. Used high userCount rp_css_revenue. Confidence: 0.72.

results.idea: Insider-trade sentiment catalyst: insider event sentiment spike detection
results.description: Single-field rp_ess_insider backfilled and ts_zscore applied to detect spikes. No vector ops. UserCount moderate-high. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Credit ratings stress vs credit composite: divergence as risk indicator
results.description: Used rp_nip_credit_ratings and rp_css_credit_ratings, backfilled both. Construct subtract of zscores to find negative divergences (downgrade risk). SUGGESTION4: chose rating fields. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Marketing event lift: partner marketing event sentiment vs composite marketing
results.description: Pair rp_ess_partner and rp_css_marketing to see if partnership events lift marketing sentiment. Backfilled. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Product news alpha: product event sentiment acceleration
results.description: Single-field rp_ess_product backfilled and ts_delta used to capture accelerating positive product news. No vector ops. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Legal risk early-warning: uptick in legal event sentiment
results.description: Used rp_ess_legal backfilled and ts_zscore to detect negative spikes. Coverage 0.5 backfilled. Lower userCount but specific signal; confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Composite sentiment momentum vs technical sentiment: business composite vs technical composite divergence
results.description: Pair rp_css_business and rp_css_technical. Backfilled both. Subtract zscores to capture divergence between fundamental/business sentiment and technical commentary. SUGGESTION4 used rp_css_business high userCount. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Society news shock: society event negative spike mean reversion
results.description: Single-field rp_ess_society backfilled and ts_zscore reversed to trade mean reversion after shock. Low userCount so confidence lower. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Price sentiment persistence: compare short vs long zscore of price composite
results.description: Used rp_css_price backfilled, computed short and long ts_zscore and subtracted to detect persistence changes. SUGGESTION1: single field but multi-horizon. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: News relevance spike: event relevance high today vs historical mean
results.description: nws18_event_relevance used to detect unusually relevant events. Backfilled (coverage 0.5) and ts_zscore applied. No vector ops. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: High-confidence news sentiment alpha: use high-confidence news sentiment QCM to predict moves
results.description: nws18_qcm (high-confidence news sentiment) backfilled and ts_zscore used. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. No vec. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Sentiment volatility: ts_std_dev of composite business sentiment
results.description: Compute ts_std_dev on rp_css_business after backfill to target names with rising sentiment volatility. Applied SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Negative news persistence: count persistent negative event sentiment
results.description: Used rp_ess_price backfilled and ts_count_nans not applicable; instead used ts_ir to measure persistent negative mean relative to std. Applied ts_backfill and ts_ir. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Earnings impact vs analyst change: earnings event sentiment minus analyst recommendation change
results.description: Pair rp_ess_earnings and nws18_ghc_lna. Backfilled both. Subtract zscores to detect divergence between event tone and recommendation changes. SUGGESTION4 used high counts. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Composite earnings acceleration: ts_delta of composite earnings sentiment
results.description: Single-field rp_css_earnings backfilled, ts_delta to capture acceleration. Simplicity and high userCount per SUGGESTION4. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Market editorial contrarian: news editorial sentiment (qmb) extreme reversal
results.description: nws18_qmb (editorials on global markets) backfilled and reversed zscore to take contrarian positions on extremes. Low userCount so cautious. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Analyst ratings momentum vs price sentiment
results.description: Pair rp_nip_ratings and rp_css_price. Backfilled both; used ts_corr to detect increasing alignment which may signal momentum. SUGGESTION4 used rating and price fields. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Composite revenue breakout: short-term jump in composite revenue sentiment
results.description: rp_css_revenue backfilled and ts_arg_max on short window to detect most recent maximum positioning. Applied ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Event-impact decay: use ts_decay_linear on event sentiment to emphasize recent events
results.description: Applied ts_decay_linear to rp_ess_mna (coverage 0.5 backfilled) to emphasize recent M&A events. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Price-target vs analyst ratings divergence
results.description: Compare rp_nip_ptg and rp_nip_ratings after backfill and zscore to find mismatches between target projections and ratings. Chosen because both relate to analyst views. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Composite equity action sentiment momentum
results.description: rp_css_equity backfilled and ts_zscore to capture momentum in equity action sentiment. Simpler single-field alpha. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Event similarity recency: days since similar event normalized
results.description: Use nws18_event_similarity_days (days since similar event) with ts_zscore after backfill to identify fresh events (small days). As field is days, reversed zscore used to prefer recent events. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: News impact vs sentiment: rp_nip_business vs rp_css_business information-ratio
results.description: Compute ts_ir of difference between rp_nip_business and rp_css_business after backfill to identify consistent impacts. Applied ts_backfill to both. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Composite ratings sudden change: ts_step of ratings composite
results.description: Use ts_step on ts_backfill(rp_css_ratings,5) to measure days counter for ratings changes; flag fresh rating moves. Backfilled. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Products vs price sentiment divergence
results.description: Pair rp_ess_product and rp_css_price, both backfilled. Subtract zscores to find names where product news hasn't moved price sentiment. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Composite marketing surge detection
results.description: rp_css_marketing backfilled and ts_zscore to detect significant marketing sentiment surges. Single-field for clarity. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Composite partner vs MNA divergence for deal rumor identification
results.description: Compare rp_css_partner and rp_css_mna after backfill and difference of zscores to surface potential deal rumors where partner talk outruns formal M&A sentiment. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Event sentiment acceleration: rp_ess_earnings double-delta
results.description: Compute two-period delta (ts_delta of ts_delta) on rp_ess_earnings after backfill to find accelerating sentiment. Coverage handled with ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Composite assets sentiment vs credit sentiment divergence
results.description: Pair rp_css_assets and rp_css_credit backfilled; subtract zscores to detect assets sentiment changing while credit lagging. SUGGESTION4 picked high userCount rp_css_assets. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Technical sentiment contrarian: technical event extreme reversal
results.description: rp_ess_technical backfilled and reversed ts_zscore to take contrarian positions on extreme technical sentiment. Low userCount warrants lower confidence. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Composite dividends surprise: rp_css_dividends spike detection
results.description: rp_css_dividends backfilled and ts_zscore used to detect sudden dividend-related sentiment spikes. Low userCount so modest confidence. Confidence: 0.48.

results.idea: Insider vs investor sentiment divergence
results.description: Compare rp_ess_insider and rp_css_inverstor after backfill; subtract zscores to find stocks where insider event sentiment contradicts investor relations sentiment. Chosen per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Composite credit deterioration signal: rising credit event negativity
results.description: rp_ess_credit backfilled and reversed ts_zscore to highlight worsening credit events. Moderate confidence. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Price-news lead-lag: short-term ts_corr between rp_nip_price and rp_css_price
results.description: Compute ts_corr between rp_nip_price and rp_css_price after backfill to detect lead-lag patterns; used SUGGESTION1 combining two related fields. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Composite ratings momentum: rp_css_ratings trend zscore
results.description: rp_css_ratings backfilled and ts_zscore applied to capture trending analyst rating sentiment. Kept simple for implementability. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Event relevance vs composite: relevance-adjusted sentiment
results.description: Combine nws18_event_relevance and rp_css_business: multiply relevance with composite sentiment after backfill to weight signals by relevance. Applied ts_backfill to both. Multiplication used but kept operators <=7. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Earnings sentiment stability: ts_std_dev of rp_css_earnings
results.description: Measure volatility of earnings composite using ts_std_dev on rp_css_earnings after backfill to prefer stable positive names. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: MNA rumor flag: partner composite surge vs MNA composite lag
results.description: Subtract rp_css_mna from rp_css_partner after backfill to flag partner talk outpacing formal M&A mention. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Analyst-impact cross: change in analyst recommendation vs price composite
results.description: Subtract nws18_ghc_lna from rp_css_price after backfill and zscore to find mismatches between recommendation changes and price sentiment. SUGGESTION4 used analyst field. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Event sentiment decay-weighted sum: weighted recent events for earnings
results.description: Use ts_decay_linear on rp_ess_earnings then ts_sum over short window after backfill to emphasize recent earnings events. Kept operators minimal. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Revenue sentiment vs sentence relevance: relevance-weighted revenue
results.description: Multiply rp_ess_revenue with nws18_event_relevance after backfill to weight revenue events by relevance. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Composite investor projection acceleration
results.description: Compute ts_delta of rp_nip_inverstor after backfill to capture accelerating projected investor-impact. High userCount used. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Earnings sentiment rank cross-sectionally
results.description: Use zscore (cross-sectional) on ts_backfill(rp_css_earnings,5) to rank names by relative earnings sentiment. SUGGESTION1 partially used (single field but cross-sectional rank). Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Ratings event mean-reversion: negative ratings event spike reversal
results.description: Reverse zscore of rp_ess_ratings after backfill to go long on overly negative rating events expecting mean reversion. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Composite sentiment momentum cross-sectional quantile
results.description: Apply quantile to ts_backfill(rp_css_business,10) cross-sectionally to pick extreme buckets. Coverage backfilled. SUGGESTION1 used cross-sectional transform. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Event sentiment information ratio over medium window
results.description: Compute ts_ir for rp_ess_partner after ts_backfill to find names with consistent partner-event signals. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Price impact projection vs composite price: difference in projected vs observed sentiment
results.description: Subtract rp_nip_price from rp_css_price after backfill and zscore to detect misalignment. Chosen per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Composite ratings vs earnings divergence
results.description: Compare rp_css_ratings and rp_css_earnings after backfill; subtract zscores to find divergences between ratings-driven sentiment and earnings sentiment. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Event sentiment kurtosis: detect fat-tail event distributions
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis on rp_ess_earnings after backfill to spot names with extreme event distributions. Coverage backfilled. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Composite investor relations quantile-based signal
results.description: Quantile on ts_backfill(rp_css_inverstor,10) to find top/bottom buckets. SUGGESTION4 used userCount. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Analyst recommendation residual vs price composite
results.description: Compute subtract of nws18_ghc_lna and rp_css_price zscores after backfill to find residuals of analyst changes vs price sentiment. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Event impact projection IR: rp_nip_ratings stability
results.description: Compute ts_ir on rp_nip_ratings after backfill to find consistent projective signals from rating-related news. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Composite product vs revenue divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_css_product from rp_css_revenue after backfill and zscore to find names where product sentiment outpaces revenue sentiment. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Price action following high-impact investor news
results.description: Multiply rp_nip_inverstor (impact projection) with ts_zscore(rp_css_price) after backfill to weight price zscore by projected investor impact. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Event count persistence proxy: days_from_last_change for event relevance
results.description: Use days_from_last_change on nws18_event_relevance after backfill to detect stale vs fresh stories; reverse to prefer fresh. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Composite marketing vs product divergence
results.description: Compare rp_css_marketing and rp_css_product after backfill: subtract zscores to find mismatch. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Earnings event lead-lag with analyst change
results.description: ts_corr between rp_ess_earnings and nws18_ghc_lna after backfill to see which leads; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Composite price vs equity action mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_css_equity from rp_css_price after backfill to find names with price moves not reflected in equity action sentiment. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term sentiment reversal: qep global equity sentiment spike
results.description: nws18_qep backfilled and reversed ts_zscore to target mean reversion after extreme global equity sentiment. Moderate userCount applied. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Composite partner event persistence: ts_count_nans proxy via ts_ir
results.description: Used ts_ir on rp_ess_partner after backfill to find persistent partner-event signals. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Revenue projection vs revenue event divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_nip_revenue (if available) but limited to rp_nip_revenue not in list; instead used rp_nip_revenue-like field rp_nip_revenue not present, so used rp_nip_business vs rp_css_revenue to proxy. Backfilled both. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Event similarity-based alpha: favor names with recent unique events
results.description: Use ts_backfill(nws18_event_similarity_days) and reverse to prefer small days (unique recent events). No vec. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Composite price-target vs price sentiment divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_css_ptg from rp_css_price after backfill and zscore to find mismatches between price targets and price sentiment. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Short-term news sentiment mean-reversion using high-confidence news
results.description: nws18_qcm backfilled and reversed short-window ts_zscore to capture mean reversion after high-confidence news extremes. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Composite insider vs legal divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_ess_insider and rp_ess_legal after backfill to find governance issues where insider sentiment contradicts legal sentiment. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Ratings vs price technical divergence
results.description: Compare rp_ess_ratings with rp_css_technical after backfill; subtract zscores to find divergence between ratings events and technical commentary. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Composite credit ratings vs credit impact mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_css_credit_ratings from rp_nip_credit_ratings after backfill to find projected credit rating moves not yet reflected in composite. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Event sentiment acceleration vs price zscore
results.description: Multiply ts_delta of rp_ess_price (backfilled) with ts_zscore of rp_css_price to find accelerating event sentiment that aligns with price zscore. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Composite business vs assets divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_css_assets from rp_css_business after backfill and zscore to detect sectors where business sentiment outperforms asset-related sentiment. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Short-term event zscore momentum: combine event sentiment with its short lag
results.description: Compute subtract of short and slightly longer ts_zscore on rp_ess_earnings after backfill to capture momentum. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Composite MNA vs partner signal for deal identification
results.description: Subtract rp_css_mna from rp_css_partner after backfill and use ts_ir to find consistent leader names. Kept operators minimal. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Analyst-change weighted by event relevance
results.description: Multiply nws18_ghc_lna with nws18_event_relevance after backfill to weight analyst changes by event relevance. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Composite revenue vs product momentum divergence
results.description: Subtract ts_delta of rp_css_revenue and rp_css_product after backfill to find disagreement in emerging momentum. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Event impact-ranking: rank names by recent event sentiment
results.description: Use ts_rank on rp_ess_earnings after backfill to prioritize names with top-ranked event sentiment. Simpler single-field implementation. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Composite investor relations vs marketing mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_css_marketing from rp_css_inverstor after backfill and zscore to identify PR disconnects. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Short-term ratings reversal: detect recent extremes in rp_nip_ratings
results.description: Reverse ts_zscore of ts_backfill(rp_nip_ratings,3) to take contrarian trades after extreme rating impact projections. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Composite price momentum vs editorial sentiment
results.description: Subtract ts_zscore of rp_css_price and nws18_qmb after backfill to find price momentum not supported by editorials. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Partner-event spike weighted by relevance
results.description: Multiply rp_ess_partner and nws18_event_relevance after backfill to elevate highly relevant partner events. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Composite price-target momentum
results.description: ts_delta on rp_css_ptg after backfill to find accelerating shifts in price-target sentiment. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Insider-event vs composite equity mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_ess_insider zscore from rp_css_equity zscore after backfill to find governance events not yet reflected in equity action sentiment. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Earnings composite vs event kurtosis divergence
results.description: Compare ts_kurtosis of rp_ess_earnings with ts_std_dev of rp_css_earnings after backfill to find names with fat-tail events vs calm composite. Operators kept within limits. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Credit projection acceleration vs composite credit
results.description: ts_delta of rp_nip_credit after backfill minus ts_zscore of rp_css_credit to find accelerating projected credit impacts. rp_nip_credit not in list; used rp_nip_credit_ratings as proxy. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: High-confidence global equity vs business composite divergence
results.description: Subtract nws18_qep zscore from rp_css_business zscore after backfill to capture when local business sentiment diverges from global editorial tone. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Event sentiment rank decay: ts_decay_linear on rp_ess_earnings rank
results.description: Apply ts_decay_linear to ts_rank of rp_ess_earnings after backfill to emphasize more recent high-ranked events. Kept within operator limits. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Composite revenue vs technical sentiment mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_css_revenue zscore and rp_css_technical zscore after backfill to find earnings-driven names lacking technical support. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Price action sensitivity to high-confidence news: correlation
results.description: ts_corr between nws18_qcm and rp_css_price after backfill to measure sensitivity of price to high-confidence news. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Composite partner event mean-reversion
results.description: Reverse ts_zscore on rp_css_partner after backfill to target mean reversion following extreme partner sentiment. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Investor-impact vs earnings-event divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_nip_inverstor zscore from rp_ess_earnings zscore after backfill to find earnings events not matched by investor-impact projections. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Composite product sentiment stability: low ts_std_dev preference
results.description: Compute ts_std_dev on rp_css_product after backfill and prefer low volatility positive names. Simple single-field measure. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Price-target surprise vs price composite
results.description: Subtract rp_css_ptg zscore from rp_css_price zscore after backfill to identify where price-target sentiment lags price sentiment. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term news-impact ranking: rank by rp_nip_inverstor
results.description: ts_rank on ts_backfill(rp_nip_inverstor,5) to find top projected-impact names. Chosen because rp_nip_inverstor has high userCount. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Composite editorial vs composite business disagreement
results.description: Subtract nws18_qmb zscore from rp_css_business zscore after backfill to detect mismatches between editorial tone and business composite. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Event sentiment momentum with winsorization
results.description: Apply winsorize to ts_backfill(rp_ess_earnings,10) then ts_zscore to reduce outliers from extreme events. SUGGESTION3 applied and winsorize used to reduce tail risk. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Composite revenue acceleration vs investor projection
results.description: Subtract ts_delta of rp_css_revenue and ts_zscore of rp_nip_inverstor after backfill to spot revenue acceleration unsupported by investor projections. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Price-related event weekly sum: ts_sum of rp_ess_price
results.description: Compute ts_sum of rp_ess_price over 7 days after backfill to capture weekly accumulation of price-related events. Simple and robust. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Partner vs product divergence for M&A product synergies
results.description: Subtract rp_css_product from rp_css_partner post-backfill to identify partner talk that could imply product synergies. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: High-confidence editorial correlation with earnings events
results.description: ts_corr between nws18_qcm and rp_ess_earnings after backfill to detect when high-confidence editorials line up with earnings events. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Composite ratings vs partner events mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_css_ratings zscore from rp_ess_partner zscore after backfill to find partner events not matched by ratings commentary. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Earnings event rolling max detection
results.description: Use ts_arg_max on rp_ess_earnings after backfill to find if today is recent maximum event intensity. Simple detection for trade signals. Confidence: 0.61.
